item.title: Creating a Wireguard VPN in k8s
item.description: What is wireguad? WireGuard is a modern VPN protocol that is designed to be faster, simpler, and more secure than other VPN protocols such as OpenVPN and IPSec. It uses modern cryptography techniques and is built into the Linux kernel, making it highly efficient and lightweight. What is kubernetes? Kubernetes is a powerful container orchestration platform that automates the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. It provides a highly scalable and fault-tolerant infrastructure for running containerized applications.
